column4: Alright, another thing: I am using empathy for IRC, how can I disable the '[some-user] has connecteced' or '[some-user]' has disconnected. There are too many of them coming :P
I am sure there is a way to disable it, but for other reasons IRC just doesn't work well with anything but a dedication IRC client
Try xchat if you use IRC a lot, or for more feature rich clients try quassel or irssi
Ya, I will try those too
